AT.name: The Phantom Thief Stina and 30 Jewels
AT.description: Schleiche dich an den Wachen vorbei, umgehe die Sicherheitscodes und spüre das Adrenalin beim Juwelendiebstahl. Es ist das Jahr 2120 und humanoide Roboter-Helfer sind an der Tagesordnung - auch unter Dieben. Aber die Phantomdiebin Stina ist keine gewöhnliche! Diese selbsternannte Künstlerin und ihr Rudel Diebe-Bots nehmen es mit der Detektivin Sara und ihren Sicherheitsrobotern in diesem epischen geistigen Wettstreit auf! Stehle alle 30 Juwelen, um das Spiel abzuschließen und den Detektiv-Modus freizuschalten. Spiele als Detektivin Sara und stelle ihr Team aus Sicherheitsrobotern auf, um die Juwelen vor der Phantomdiebin zu schützen. Kannst du die Juwelen vor der Phantomdiebin beschützen? Ein Strategie- und Actionspiel in Echtzeit, bei dem du als Heldin und als Bösewicht spielen kannst. Was liegt dir besser? Features: - Zusätzlichen Spielmodus freischalten! - Spiele als Diebin oder Detektivin! - 30 anspruchsvolle Level!

BG.name: The Phantom Thief Stina and 30 Jewels
BG.description: Sneak pass the guards, bypass the security codes and experience the rush of stealing the jewels. The year is 2120, and humanoid robot helpers are commonplace, even among thieves. Not that the Phantom Thief Stina is a commonplace thief! This self-proclaimed artiste and her pack of burglar bots are taking on Detective Sara and her robotic security team in an epic battle of wits! Heist all 30 jewels to complete the game and unlock the detective mode. Play as detective Sara and deploy her robotic security team to protect the jewels against the Phantom Thief. Are you able to protect the jewels against the Phantom Thief? A real-time strategy and action game that allow you to play as both the hero and villain; which one will you excel at? Features: - Unlock additional game mode! - Play as the thief or the detective! - 30 Challenging Stages!

BE.name: The Phantom Thief Stina and 30 Jewels
BE.description: Passe les gardes furtivement, pirate les codes de sécurité et savoure la sensation du vol éclair des joyaux. Nous sommes en 2120, et les robots assistants humanoïdes sont monnaie courante, même chez les voleurs. Mais Phantom Thief Stina n'a rien de commun ! Cette artiste autoproclamée et son équipe de robots voleurs affrontent l'inspecteur Sara et son équipe de sécurité robotisée lors d'un combat psychologique épique ! Dérobe les 30 joyaux pour terminer le jeu et débloquer le mode inspecteur. Joue le rôle de l'inspecteur Sara et déploie son équipe de sécurité robotisée pour protéger les joyaux de Phantom Thief ! Un jeu d'action et de stratégie temps réel dans lequel tu pourras prendre la place du héros ou du bandit ; dans quel rôle brilleras-tu ? Caractéristiques : - Débloque un mode de jeu supplémentaire ! - 30 stimulant Niveaux ! - Joue le rôle du héros ou du bandit !

ES.name: The Phantom Thief Stina and 30 Jewels
ES.description: Entra sin que se den cuenta los guardias, elude los códigos de seguridad y vive la emoción de robar las joyas. Corre el año 2120 y los robots humanoides ayudantes son algo cotidiano, incluso entre los ladrones. Sin embargo, Stina, la Ladrona Fantasma, ¡no es una ladrona nada común! ¡Esta artista autoproclamada y su banda de robots ladrones se enfrentarán a la Detective Sara y su equipo de seguridad robótico en una épica batalla de ingenio! Roba las 30 joyas para completar el juego y desbloquea el modo detective. Juega como la detective Sara y despliega a su equipo de seguridad robótico para proteger las joyas contra la Ladrona Fantasma. ¿Eres capaz de proteger las joyas contra la Ladrona Fantasma? Un juego de estrategia y acción en tiempo real que te permite jugar en el papel de heroína o de villana. ¿En cuál de ellos sobresaldrás? Caracteristicas: - Desbloquea un modo de juego adicional! - 30 desafiante fases! - Juega de heroína o villana!

FI.description: Sneak pass the guards, bypass the security codes and experience the rush of stealing the jewels. The year is 2120, and humanoid robot helpers are commonplace, even among thieves. IT.name: The Phantom Thief Stina and 30 Jewels
IT.description: Muoviti di soppiatto tra le guardie, bypassa i codici di sicurezza e prova il brivido nel rubare i gioielli. L'anno è il 2120, e i servitori robot umanoidi sono ormai comuni, anche tra i ladri. Non che la Ladra fantasma Stina sia una ladra comune! Questa autoproclamata artista e il suo branco di robot scassinatori hanno deciso di affrontare la detective Sara e la sua squadra robotica di sicurezza in un'epica battaglia d'astuzia! Ruba tutti i 30 gioielli per completare il gioco e sbloccare la modalità detective. Gioca quindi nei panni della detective Sara e schiera la sua squadra robotica di sicurezza per proteggere i gioielli dalla Ladra fantasma. Riuscirai a proteggere i gioielli dalla Ladra fantasma? Un gioco d'azione e di strategia in tempo reale che ti permetterà di vestire sia i panni dell'eroe, sia quelli del cattivo. In quale dei due ruoli darai il tuo meglio? Caratteristiche: - Sblocca una modalità di gioco aggiuntiva! - Gioca nei panni della ladra o della detective! - 30 livelli impegnativi!

LT.name: The Phantom Thief Stina and 30 Jewels
LT.description: Sneak pass the guards, bypass the security codes and experience the rush of stealing the jewels. The year is 2120, and humanoid robot helpers are commonplace, even among thieves. Not that the Phantom Thief Stina is a commonplace thief! This self-proclaimed artiste and her pack of burglar bots are taking on Detective Sara and her robotic security team in an epic battle of wits! Features: - Unlock additional game mode! - Play as the thief or the detective! - 30 Challenging Stages!

NL.name: The Phantom Thief Stina and 30 Jewels
NL.description: Glip langs de bewakers, omzeil de beveiligingscodes en ervaar de roes die je krijgt van juwelen stelen. Het is het jaar 2120 en humanoïde robothelpers zijn alledaags geworden, zelfs onder dieven. Ook al is Spookdief Stina geen alledaagse dief! Deze zelfverklaarde artieste en haar troep inbraakrobots nemen het in deze epische strijd met al hun vernuft op tegen Detective Sara en haar robotveiligheidsteam. Jat alle 30 juwelen om het spel uit te spelen en zo de detectivemodus te ontsluiten. Speel als detective Sara en zet haar robotveiligheidsteam in om de juwelen te beschermen tegen de Spookdief! Lukt het jou om de juwelen te beschermen tegen de Spookdief? Een real-time strategie- en actiespel waarmee je zowel als de held of als de slechterik kunt spelen – hoe ga jij uitblinken? Beschrijving: - Ontgrendel een extra speelmodus! - Speel als de dief of als de detective! - 30 uitdagende levels!

PL.name: The Phantom Thief Stina and 30 Jewels
PL.description: Sneak pass the guards, bypass the security codes and experience the rush of stealing the jewels. The year is 2120, and humanoid robot helpers are commonplace, even among thieves. Not that the Phantom Thief Stina is a commonplace thief! This self-proclaimed artiste and her pack of burglar bots are taking on Detective Sara and her robotic security team in an epic battle of wits! Heist all 30 jewels to complete the game and unlock the detective mode. Play as detective Sara and deploy her robotic security team to protect the jewels against the Phantom Thief. Are you able to protect the jewels against the Phantom Thief? A real-time strategy and action game that allow you to play as both the hero and villain; which one will you excel at? Features: - Unlock additional game mode! - Play as the thief or the detective! - 30 Challenging Stages!

PT.name: The Phantom Thief Stina and 30 Jewels
PT.description: Passa sorrateiramente pelos guardas, contorna os códigos de segurança e experimenta a adrenalina de roubar as joias. O ano é 2120, e os ajudantes de robô humanoide são comuns, mesmo entre os ladrões. Não que a Ladra Fantasma Stina seja uma ladra comum! Esta autoproclamada artista e o seu bloco de robôs assaltantes ocupam a detetive Sara e a sua equipa de segurança numa épica batalha de inteligência! Rouba todas as 30 joias para concluíres o jogo e desbloqueares o modo de detetive. Joga como a detetive Sara e instala a tua equipa de segurança robótica para proteger as joias contra a Ladra Fantasma. És capaz de proteger as joias contra a Ladra Fantasma? Um jogo de estratégia e de ação em tempo real que te permite jogar como herói (heroína) e como vilão (vilã); em qual deles te destacas? Funcionalidades: - Desbloqueia um modo de jogo adicional. - 30 desafiante Níveis - Joga como herói (heroína) e como vilão (vilã).

RU.name: The Phantom Thief Stina and 30 Jewels
RU.description: Проберитесь мимо охранников, обойдите защитные коды и испытайте кайф от кражи драгоценных камней. Действие происходит в 2120 году, и использование гуманоидных роботов-помощников является обычным явлением даже среди воров. Однако воровка-призрак Стина не является обычной воровкой! Она самопровозглашенный мастер своего дела, и ее команда ботов-взломщиков бросает вызов детективу Сару и ее команда роботов безопасности в эпической битве умов! Украдите все 30 драгоценных камней, чтобы закончить игру и разблокировать режим детектива. Играйте за детектива Сару и вводите в дело ее команду роботов безопасности для защиты драгоценностей от Вора-призрака. Удастся ли вам защитить драгоценные камни от Вора-призрака? Стратегическая и экшн-игра в реальном времени, которая позволяет вам играть как за героя, так и за злодея. В каком качестве вы добьетесь успеха? Особенности: - откройте дополнительный режим игры! - играйте за вора или детектива! - 30 сложных этапов!

SE.description: Sneak pass the guards, bypass the security codes and experience the rush of stealing the jewels. The year is 2120, and humanoid robot helpers are commonplace, even among thieves. SI.name: The Phantom Thief Stina and 30 Jewels
SI.description: Sneak pass the guards, bypass the security codes and experience the rush of stealing the jewels. The year is 2120, and humanoid robot helpers are commonplace, even among thieves. Not that the Phantom Thief Stina is a commonplace thief! This self-proclaimed artiste and her pack of burglar bots are taking on Detective Sara and her robotic security team in an epic battle of wits! Heist all 30 jewels to complete the game and unlock the detective mode. Play as detective Sara and deploy her robotic security team to protect the jewels against the Phantom Thief. Are you able to protect the jewels against the Phantom Thief? A real-time strategy and action game that allow you to play as both the hero and villain; which one will you excel at? Features: - Unlock additional game mode! - Play as the thief or the detective! - 30 Challenging Stages!
